name: Brown Bear
movement: 40 ft. speed on land, 30 ft. climbing
description: A massive, powerful predator with thick, shaggy fur, long claws, and a robust build, capable of standing on its hind legs. Known for its impressive combat abilities and keen sense of smell.
memorable: The brown bear is striking for its sheer size and strength as a predator, known for swiping with powerful claws and delivering crushing bites.
goals: Foraging for food and hunting large prey, often solitary and active during the summer months preparing for hibernation.
relations: Can be encountered alongside various wildlife; often preys on animals like deer and moose.
environment: Typically found in forests, mountainous areas, and other wilderness environments.
strengths: Strong physical attacks with high damage output; excellent swimmer and climber.
weaknesses: Low armor class makes it vulnerable to physical attacks; limited intelligence and strategy.
attacks: Can deliver a powerful bite (11 piercing damage) and swiping claws attack (9 slashing damage), capable of grappling smaller targets.
most_powerful_ability: Keen Smell, granting advantage on Perception checks relying on smell, making it difficult to surprise.
senses: Passive perception of 13 allows it to notice many details in its environment.
skills: Proficient in Perception checks, enhancing its ability to detect prey.
additional_information: Can grapple Medium or smaller creatures with its claws attack, focusing combat.
Primarily solitary but can be seen in paired instances during mating season.
Impressive adaptability in climbing and swimming despite size.
